title: Frontend Developer
description: Seeking a frontend developer with strong skills in React, Redux, and modern CSS frameworks to build user-centric web applications.

requisites.education: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or related field

title: Backend Engineer (Python)
description: Join our team to design and implement scalable backend services using Python, Django, and PostgreSQL. Experience with REST APIs is a must.

requisites.education: Bachelor's or Master's Degree in Software Engineering

title: Full-Stack Developer
description: We are looking for a versatile full-stack developer proficient in the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) to work on our flagship product.

requisites.education: Bachelor's Degree or equivalent experience

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Automate and streamline our operations and processes. Must have experience with AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD pipelines.

requisites.education: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or Cloud Certifications

title: Mobile Developer (iOS)
description: Develop and maintain our iOS application. Proficiency in Swift and SwiftUI is required. Experience with mobile CI/CD is a plus.

requisites.education: Bachelor's Degree in Software Development or equivalent

title: Data Scientist
description: Analyze large datasets to extract meaningful insights. Strong knowledge of Python, R, and machine learning libraries like Scikit-learn and TensorFlow is needed.

requisites.education: Master's or Ph.D. in Data Science, Statistics, or Computer Science

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Create intuitive and engaging user interfaces. Must have a strong portfolio showcasing your work with Figma, Sketch, and Adobe XD.

requisites.education: Bachelor's Degree in Design, HCI, or related field

title: Software Engineer in Test (QA)
description: Develop and execute automated tests to ensure product quality. Experience with Selenium, Cypress, or Playwright is highly desirable.

requisites.education: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or QA Certifications

title: Junior Web Developer
description: An exciting opportunity for a recent graduate to learn and grow. Basic knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript is required.

requisites.education: Bootcamp completion or self-taught with portfolio

title: Senior Backend Developer (Java)
description: Lead the development of our core microservices. Expert in Java, Spring Boot, and building resilient, high-performance systems.

requisites.education: Bachelor's or Master's Degree in Computer Science

title: React Native Developer
description: Build cross-platform mobile applications for iOS and Android using React Native. You will be responsible for the full development lifecycle.

requisites.education: Bachelor's Degree in Software Development or equivalent

title: Cloud Architect
description: Design and oversee our company's cloud computing strategy. Deep expertise in either AWS, Azure, or GCP is essential.

requisites.education: Master's Degree or extensive Cloud Certifications

title: Technical Product Manager
description: Define product vision, strategy, and roadmap. You will work closely with engineering teams to guide products from conception to launch.

requisites.education: Bachelor's Degree in Business, Engineering, or Computer Science

title: Full-Stack Engineer (Ruby on Rails)
description: Maintain and improve our existing Rails applications. We are looking for a developer who is passionate about writing clean, efficient, and maintainable code.

requisites.education: Bachelor's Degree or strong portfolio

title: Cybersecurity Analyst
description: Protect our digital assets by monitoring, detecting, and responding to security threats. Certifications like CISSP or CompTIA Security+ are a plus.

requisites.education: Bachelor's Degree in Cybersecurity or relevant certifications (CISSP, CompTIA Security+)

title: WordPress Developer
description: Customize and maintain WordPress sites for our clients. Strong PHP, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript skills are necessary. Experience with custom themes and plugins.

requisites.education: Self-taught or relevant web development courses

title: Game Developer (Unity)
description: Join our creative team to develop exciting new mobile games using the Unity engine. Strong C# skills and a passion for gaming are a must.

requisites.education: Bachelor's Degree in Game Development or Computer Science

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Design, build, and deploy machine learning models. You will work on challenging problems in natural language processing and computer vision.

requisites.education: Master's or Ph.D. in AI, Machine Learning, or Computer Science

title: Angular Developer
description: We are looking for an experienced Angular developer to join our frontend team. You will be responsible for building modern, responsive web applications.

requisites.education: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience

title: Lead Software Engineer
description: Lead a team of talented engineers, provide technical guidance, and drive the architectural vision for our next-generation platform.

requisites.education: Bachelor's or Master's Degree in Computer Science
